apple_vendor_description: This kiss emoji, featuring a woman and a person with light skin tones and no explicit skin tone variation, embodies tenderness and affection as seen on Apple devices. The gentle blush on the cheeks and the soft, rounded curves of the faces are rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading, giving it a warm and intimate feel. On Apple devices, this emoji is ideal for expressing romantic feelings, deep care, or a loving farewell.
